tool_description: The AI-driven Crypto Signals API utilizes advanced algorithms to analyze cryptocurrency market data and deliver signals
name: Crypto Signals API
title: Crypto Signals API

api_list.name: Signal
api_list.description:
This endpoint accepts a symbol parameter in the request, and in response, it provides an array of trading signals for the specified cryptocurrency symbol. Each signal includes the statement providing insight into the market trend, along with the prospect and strength of the signal.

The response contains details for up to 20 of the most recent trading signals associated with the provided cryptocurrency symbol.

Currently, it supports BTC, ETH, XRP, SOL, ADA.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-signals-api.p.rapidapi.com/signal/BTC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-signals-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-signals-api.p.rapidapi.com/signal/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-signals-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
